page.title: 17QUIVALS' GARAGE
page.content: Mr.Flett has been in the{motor trade for 36 years. He chose to work in a garage because he enjoys working as a mechanic. He has worked at{Quivals' {Garage}(on the border between Cross & Burness) for 1 year 9 months. He { {starts}work at{8.30am}and{finishes}any time after{5.30pm.}He has{one other {full time worker}helping him. He wears old jeans, a shirt & steel-toed boots for work in the summer & a jumper, body warmer & overalls in the winter. When a car{breaks down on the road , he goes out &{tries to repair it {there,}but if this is impossible, he {tows it to the garage}to work on it. He normally{repairs 5 or 6 cars}in a {week.}He also{sells motor cycles, {bicycles & cars;}& runs a{taxi service which is in great demand by the Sanday folk.
